sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Vocational Academies Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Vocational Academies Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The purpose of this Act is to integrate workplace competencies and career and technical education with core academic subjects.
